int main ()
{  int t; scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{

 ll m,n,k;
 scanf("%lld%lld%lld",&n,&k,&m);
 if(k==1) { goto end;
 }
 if(n%k!=0)
 { if(m%2!=0) n=n*k;
 goto end;
 }
 
 else
 { while(m!=0 && n%k==0)
{
 n=n/k;
 m--; }
 }
 
 if(m%2!=0) n=n*k; 
end: 
cout<<n<<endl;
}

return 0;
}
